New Records: Finn Allen scored 137 runs from 62 balls, including 16 sixes and 5 fours
Key Match Events: Finn Allen hit Haris Rauf for 27 runs in one over
New Zealand opener Finn Allen was on fire against Pakistan, scoring 137 runs
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand won the third T20I by 45 runs, sealing the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The third T20I was played at the University Oval in Dunedin on January 17, 2024
Others: The video of Finn Allen smacking Haris Rauf for 27 runs in an over went viral on the internet
